hero.bottomDescription: On the lands of Reims, we have been restoring Metal live music's nobility, for more than YEAR years.

alts.tagada: The drummer of Tagada Jones's band.
alts.theDevilWearsPrada: Two members of The Devil Wears Prada's band.
alts.crowd: A crowd of Metal music fans, at one of our concert.

descriptionSection.quote: At Lez Arts Aki, we are driven by music, and especially Metal music. Since 2018, our goal has been to animate the region of Reims by organizing cultural events with a Metallic twist. Our completely crazy team of volunteers of about ten people, is more than determined to carry the banner of Champagne's Metal music.
descriptionSection.author: Chief of Lez Arts Aki
descriptionSection.alt: Ludovic Coppin, chief, and Marion Boesch, responsible for communication and scheduling of the association Lez Arts Aki

timeline.title: Lez Arts Aki in a few dates

dates.title:
May 2018, Our beginnings 
at the Dropkick Bar
dates.text: Lez Arts Aki had his first steps in the Dropkick Bar of Reims. This evening gathered the bands Undead, Sky Machine, and Midnight Blackout.
dates.alt: Crowd at a concert in April 2024.

dates.title: 2019, First Sold-Out at L'Atmosphère in Rethel
dates.text: A new milestone reached with our first sold-out at L'Atmosphère of Rethel, where legends of Metal like Ultra Vomit, Tagada Jones, and Black Bomb A inflammed the show.
dates.alt: The guitarist of Black Bomb A's band, in 2019.

dates.title:
2021, Festival Arts en Pagaille
in Bétheny
dates.text: The Arts en Pagaille's festival in Bétheny allowed us to have bands like Loudblast, Unswabbed, and Protogonos play ; a powerful return after Covid's pandemic period.
dates.alt: The singer and the guitarist of Protogonos's band, in 2022.

dates.title: 2022, Two Sold-Out Concerts at La Cartonnerie in Reims
dates.text: This year was a breakpoint for us, with two Sold-Out concerts at La Cartonnerie in Reims, where Forest In Blood, Disconnected, and Inward, confirming our anchored presence on the Metal music stage of Reims.

lastDate.title: More than 20 dates since, with Local and National Artists
lastDate.text: Since these first dates, Lez Arts Aki organized more than 20 events, mixing local talents and big national names, as Maudits, Landmvrks, and Dagoba.
lastDate.secondAlt: Guitarist of the band The Devil Wears Prada.

covid.title: Lez Arts Aki during Pandemic
covid.paragraph: We decided in 2020 and 2021 to form a collective : Les Rémois se bougent, translated by Reims on the way, to create despite the crisis. 3 covers of famous Metal musics were performed by Reims's ecosystem.
